title: Foundations of Micro-Pile Design Optimization for Landslide Prevention in Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of soil mechanics and geotechnical engineering
context.additional_context: A foundational landslide prevention engineering training program to enhance the job competencies of in-service professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of micro-pile arrays (spacing, depth, reinforcement materials).
Learners can interpret geotechnical stability analysis results using machine learning.
Learners can evaluate the design validity based on load distribution ratios (1:0.7:0.6) in a three-row pile arrangement.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
